snippet: A 20-foot-tall guard tower from the Louisiana State Penitentiary, better known as Angola, is joining the collection of the National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington.
abstract: A 20-foot-tall guard tower from the Louisiana State Penitentiary, better known as Angola, is joining the collection of the National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington.

headline.main: Prison Tower to Join New Museum's Collection
headline.print_headline: An Institutional Change For Angola Guard Tower
